title: Nick Jr. Schedule
description: What's on Today: July 3, 2018. All times are ET.

schedule.description: Blaze discovers an exciting new sport called Truckball. But when Crusher and his team of cronies challenge him, Blaze must scour all of Axle City to put together a Truckball team before the big game.

Strings! Brass! Woodwinds! Percussion! After Gil and Molly meet a conductor, the Guppies want to join an orchestra. Led by a conductor from another planet, the Guppies’ orchestra will make music that’s out of this world!
It’s going to be the best doghouse EVER!  But before Bubble Puppy can move into his new doggy digs, the Bubble Guppies have to build it. Help them build it while discovering all about construction.
While outside skateboarding, Bobgoblin comes down with a goblin cold.
When a magic word makes Gina Giant’s new doll run away, Wally and Gina must go on an adventure to get Running Rita back.

It’s Junk Day and Benny’s showing Dora and Boots his wagon of cool junk. But when the junk truck accidentally takes Backpack and Map off to the junkyard, it’s up to Dora, Boots, Benny and his wagon of stuff to rescue them!
Uh oh!  A Big Storm Cloud is coming.  Dora and Boots have to warn all their friends in the forest to get home fast so the Big Storm Cloud doesn't rain on them and get them wet.
Meet Diego, Dora's super cool cousin.  Diego works at the Animal Rescue Center.  He can make animal noises and talk to wild animals!

When a bundle of bunnies accidentally turn Bo Monkey’s banana plant into a gigantic banana monster, the Fresh Beat Band of Spies must work together to create an antidote solution before it’s too late!

Yi Haw, a hootin’ and hollerin’ cowgirl, isn’t just robbing buildings around town - she’s stealing them! It’s up to the Fresh Beat Band of Spies to saddle up and catch the wildest outlaw before the entire city disappears!

schedule.episodeTitle: What Time Is It for Blue?
schedule.description: What time is it now?  We play Blue's Clues to figure it out.
As we discover what Blue needs, we take the time to help Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper find fruits by describing where they are  in relation to each other.

schedule.episodeTitle: Blue Wants To Play a Song Game!
schedule.description: Blue and Steve are playing song games and it's Blue's turn to choose a song. We play Blue's Clues to figure out which song game she wants to play.

schedule.episodeTitle: The Bunny Who Cried Lobster/Max and The Three Bears/Little Ruby Hen
schedule.description: The Bunny Who Cried Lobster-Ruby doesn’t believe Max’s lobster took her cake, so she tells him the tale of the “Bunny Who Cried Wolf.”

schedule.episodeTitle: Ruby Writes a Story/Max's Dominoes/Grandma's Attic
schedule.description: Ruby needs absolute quiet while she tries to write a story. But Max wants to play cowboy. Eventually he helps Ruby come up with the perfect idea for her story.

Based on the beloved books by Rosemary Wells, each episode of Max & Ruby centers around Max, a preschool bunny, and his seven-year-old sister Ruby. The humorous relationship between siblings is at the heart of these stories.

Dora, Boots and Diego need to bring a giant baby dinosaur home to his mommy at Dino Island.  It's a prehistoric adventure through a land of dinosaurs.  Tiptoe past a T-Rex, meet a Compsagnathus - the world's smallest dinosaur.

schedule.episodeTitle: A Crown for King Juan el Bobo
schedule.description: Dora and Boots set out to help King Juan el Bobo find his crown so we can all go to his Mamí's birthday party. Where did the forgetful king put his crown?

Diego reads Baby Manatee her favorite story.  There was once a Mermaid City on the ocean floor.  But one day, the ground started to shake so much that a mountain started to grow under the city -- lifting Mermaid City.

schedule.episodeTitle: Super Flying Squirrel to the Rescue!
schedule.description: Diego is riding his motorcycle when he encounters a Flying Squirrel trying to save a pygmy marmoset.  But the marmoset is too heavy and Diego must come to the rescue!  Flying Squirrel feels bad he wasn’t able to do it alone.

schedule.episodeTitle: Franklin and the Mystery of the Berry Bogie/Franklin Sees a Storm
schedule.description:
Will Franklin be able to get the Super Cluepers to work together to find the mysterious Berry Bogie?


After a terrible storm ruins their tree fort, Franklin and friends must find a place to build a new one.
When Quack is scared of the dark on a moonless night, Zack decides there’s only one thing to do – rocket into space to light it up!

schedule.episodeTitle: Little Bear Sings a Song/A House For Mitzi/Up A Tree
schedule.description:
Little Bear and his friends make up a song and do the actions that go along with it.

After Little Bear awakes to find Mitzi sleeping outside in a tree, he and his friends build her a tree house of her own.

Young fairy princess Holly and her best friend Ben Elf live in Little Kingdom, a tiny land where flowers and grass grow above the tallest towers. Together, Holly and Ben go on adventures with their friends and work together to fix magical mistakes.

schedule.episodeTitle: The Bigger the Better!/Help Little Bo Peep!
schedule.description: What's gonna work?  Teamwork!  So sing The Wonder Pets - Linny the Guinea Pig, Ming-Ming Duckling, and Turtle Tuck - three classroom pets turned heroes who travel the world to save young animals in distress!

There is a buzz in town as it’s finally time for the world famous Tickety Talent Time show. All our residents are practicing their dancing, singing and bell ringing to try and impress the svengali judge, Bopparoo!

Join Pablo the precocious penguin, Tyrone the mellow moose, appropriately named Uniqua, a determined hippo named Tasha and the cutest kangaroo on the block, Austin, for backyard musical adventures as big as their imaginations.

Bigger, Better, Broomier!: The Charmers want flashier new brooms for an air show, hurting their old broomies’ feelings.

Night Owls: When the charmers go night camping, Posie’s little night owl tags along for the fun.

In this animated musical-comedy-adventure series, expert hairstylist Sunny uses her unique skills, positive attitude, and physical prowess to creatively solve problems and help friends in the colorful community of Friendly Falls.
Nella is a princess who transforms into a knight! She goes on fantastical adventures with her friends, Sir Garret, Trinket, and Clod, to fight for what's right.

schedule.episodeTitle: The Tale of the Stolen Firewood/The Tale of the Runaway Rabbit
schedule.description: When Peter, Lily and Benjamin go out to collect firewood, they soon find that not one but three predators are after some too. Can the rabbits stage a series of daring raids to retrieve it?

schedule.episodeTitle: Ruby's Lemonade Stand/Ruby's Rummage Sale/Ruby's Magic Act
schedule.description: Business is booming for Ruby and Louise  who open a lemonade stand to raise money for Bunny Scouts.  It's a nickel a glass and going fast.  Max loves lemonade but doesn't have a nickel to his name.

Everyone puts the most beautiful photos of the year in an album. Cuquín spills juice all over them and ruins them. What a disaster! Everyone gets sad - those were their memories! But Cleo decides to be a photographer and take new photos.

Cleo & Cuquin follows the adventures of Cleo, Cuquin, and their siblings. They will resolve minor conflicts by playing at being something: gardener, astronaut... at the end of each chapter, Cleo will discover what she wants to be when she grows up.
Maripi loses a tooth and is ashamed of her smile. Cleo makes her see that it’s not so bad and tries to get her smile back. She will be her dentist!
Cuquin discovers Maripí’s new car, and he loves it. He tries to drive it and has an accident. The car is destroyed! Cleo decides to fix it. Will she succeed?

The Squirrels are playing with their toys when they notice that there is a sheep in the clubhouse. Wait a minute! There are sheep everywhere! Inside and out! How did that happen! Oh no - someone has left the paddock gate open.

Duggee and the squirrels take their teddy bears out for a picnic. But hang on – who does that HUGE teddy belong to? Oh! That’s not a teddy, it’s Beryl and she’s a real bear! She wants to join but has no teddy of her own.

Duggee has made a delicious apple pie. He puts in on the windowsill to cool down - but the second his back is turned it’s gone. Who took it? How can the squirrels find out? Fortunately, Duggee has his Detective Badge.
While outside skateboarding, Bobgoblin comes down with a goblin cold.
Thomas is still lost on the Mainland, when he comes across a Steelworks where he is put to work by some experimental engines. James decides to head to the Mainland himself to find him!

When the Team’s friend Mike falls off his scooter and scrapes his knee, it’s Dr. Bot to the rescue! The Team sets off to the playground to deliver a bandage to Mike, while they remedy tricky situations along the way!

ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks, featuring international superstars Alvin, Simon and Theodore, takes us on a roller coaster ride of music, laughter and stories geared to entertain The Chipmunks’ four generations of fans.

schedule.episodeTitle: Rusty Digs In/Rusty's Brave Cave Save

schedule.description: When Blaze and Starla encounter a herd of cows wandering out in the desert, they must embark on a wild west adventure to bring them back to Starla’s barn.

schedule.episodeTitle: Rod's Beary Brave Save/Race Through Danger Canyon
schedule.description:
Rod proves he’s “a rooster, not a chicken” as he finds a cute little bear cub lost in Haunted Cave.

A jet-flying bat roars into Danger Canyon to show off his prowess. Swift must match his skills and race to the rescue.

schedule.episodeTitle: A Dolphin is a Guppy's Best Friend!
schedule.description: Molly and Gil meet Buddy, a baby dolphin with the friendliest face in the sea! Today is Buddy’s first birthday, and his pod is throwing him a surprise birthday party!

schedule.episodeTitle: Zahramay Dreams/Careful What You Wish For

schedule.description: Nella is a princess who transforms into a knight! She goes on fantastical adventures with her friends, Sir Garret, Trinket, and Clod, to fight for what's right.

In this animated musical-comedy-adventure series, expert hairstylist Sunny uses her unique skills, positive attitude, and physical prowess to creatively solve problems and help friends in the colorful community of Friendly Falls.

schedule.episodeTitle: Mr. Fox's Shop/Shadows/International Day/The Rainy Day Game/Mummy Rabbit's Bump
schedule.description: Mr. Fox's Shop/Shadows/International Day/The Rainy Day Game/Mummy Rabbit's Bump

schedule.episodeTitle: Desert Island/Going Boating/The Little Boat/The Sand Pit/The Aquarium
schedule.description: When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them. He soon realises he misses the sea after all.

Peppa and George are playing with bubbles./Peppa and her friends are at their playgroup today./Granny and Grandpa’s pet comes to stay./Peppa and her family are having a picnic lunch./The family is watching their favourite show.

When the Team’s friend Mike falls off his scooter and scrapes his knee, it’s Dr. Bot to the rescue! The Team sets off to the playground to deliver a bandage to Mike, while they remedy tricky situations along the way!

schedule.episodeTitle: Rusty Digs In/Rusty's Brave Cave Save
Rod's Beary Brave Save/Race Through Danger Canyon
schedule.description:
Rod proves he’s “a rooster, not a chicken” as he finds a cute little bear cub lost in Haunted Cave.

A jet-flying bat roars into Danger Canyon to show off his prowess. Swift must match his skills and race to the rescue.
When Blaze and Starla encounter a herd of cows wandering out in the desert, they must embark on a wild west adventure to bring them back to Starla’s barn.
Spongebob and Patrick must paint Mr. Krabs living room without getting a drop of paint on anything but the walls./Learn how to become a Krusty Krab employee in this episode.
Squidward accidentally lets SpongeBob eat an exploding pie./Plankton schemes to steal the Krabby patty by disguising himself as Mr. Krabs.

schedule.episodeTitle: Pups Save the Soccer Game/Pups Save a Lucky Collar
schedule.description: Mayor Humdinger challenges the Adventure Bay team to a soccer match, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol are called in to play. The Paw Patrol must work as a team to overcome some dirty tricks by Mayor Humdinger and pull out a victory!

schedule.episodeTitle: Parachute Jump/Miss Rabbit’s Taxi/Playing Pretend/Scooters/George’s Racing Car
schedule.description:
The school roof is leaking, so Mummy Pig does a parachute jump to raise money to fix it!

Miss Rabbit spends the day picking people up and dropping people off in her job as taxi driver.
Goby needs help from the Bubble Guppies to retrace his steps and find his lost toy dump truck at a construction site before a wild, bucking bulldozer crushes it!

Ribbit! Gil and Goby bring a tadpole named Fernando to school to watch him grow into a frog. When Fernando’s ready to hop, Gil and Goby will have to lead him back to his pond in the traditional Running of the Bullfrogs!

schedule.episodeTitle: Pups Save Daring Danny X/Pups in a Fix
schedule.description:
Daring Danny X takes his ambitions too far when he attempts a jump over Rattle Snake Canyon! The Paw Patrol wows with a mid-air rescue.

RoboDog’s wiring gets mixed up, and he goes on a fixing rampage around Adventure Bay!

schedule.episodeTitle: Pups Save a Bat/Pups Save a Toof
schedule.description: PAW Patrol is a CG action-adventure preschool series starring a pack of six heroic puppies led by a tech-savvy 10-year-old boy named Ryder.

schedule.episodeTitle: Pups Save Big Hairy/Pups Save a Flying Kitty
schedule.description:
Pups need to lure a big ape onto the PAW Patroller so they can take him back to the jungle.

Skye Kitty gets stuck beside an eagle's nest and needs help getting down.

schedule.episodeTitle: Pups Save the Gliding Turbots/Pups Save a Plane
schedule.description:
When Francois and Cap’n Turbot become stranded on a remote island, Ryder and the pups fly in to find and rescue the bickering cousins.

It’s a double daring mid-air rescue as Mayor Goodway’s first flying lesson goes sideways!

When three big emergencies turn out to be too much for one truck alone, Blaze turns himself and his friends into super strong robots to save Axle City from a runaway train, an overflowing glue factory, and an erupting volcano!

schedule.episodeTitle: Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Pirated Sea Patroller
schedule.description: The ferris wheel has been stolen by Sid the Pirate and Arrby. The pups set out to bring it back to Adventure Bay! However, Sid comes up with an even more sneaky plan: to steal the Sea Patroller!

schedule.episodeTitle: Pups Find a Genie/Pups Save a Tightrope Walker
schedule.description:
Rubble finds an old brass Jack in the Box, with a genie inside who grants him three wishes!

Francois Turbot is bravely walking a tightrope, but seagulls threaten to ruin his act. Time to call the PAW Patrol!
SpongeBob invites Vikings to the Krusty Krab so that he can learn everything about them

Patrick has a box and won’t show SpongeBob what’s inside.  SpongeBob's curiousity gets the best of him./Squidward's old rival brags to Squid about his famous marching band. Feeling outdone, Squid says he has a band too.

schedule.episodeTitle: Krusty Dogs/The Wreck of the Mauna Loa
schedule.description: Mr. Krabs decides to start selling hot dogs instead of Krabby Patties.

schedule.episodeTitle: Sweet and Sour Squidward/The Googly Artiste
schedule.description: Plankton tries to befriend Squidward in an effort to steal the Krabby Patty formula.
When Captain Man suddenly announces he’s getting married, Henry and Charlotte go searching for answers only to discover that things are not as they seem.
Siblings take on best friends in a series of tossing games. And both teams realize they need to practice their aiming skills! Only one team moves on to the obstacle course.

When all 10 of Lincoln’s sisters ask him to cover for them on the same day, Lincoln has his hands full.
Bobby and Lori go on a double date with Lincoln and Bobby’s little sister, Ronnie Anne.

Lincoln is worried that he’s lost his manliness from growing up with all sisters, so he and Clyde go camping.
Lincoln gets Lori a job at a pizza arcade, but when he starts to ask favors of her, Lori gets in hot water.

After Lincoln gets a pink hand-me-down bike from Lori, he borrows Lynn’s cool BMX bike without telling her.
Someone clogged the Loud House toilet and Lincoln sets out to find out whodunit.

When Clyde thinks his parents are having another baby he goes to Lincoln for help on how to be a great big brother.
When Lori and Leni both buy the same dress, a fight breaks out leading to Defcon five in the Loud house.

To try and make gym class better, Lincoln and Clyde set Coach Pacowski and Mrs. Johnson up.

Luan mentors Lucy, teaching her how to manage the ups and downs of pursuing a life in the arts.

schedule.episodeTitle: Roadie to Nowhere/A Fridge Too Far
schedule.description:
After learning that Chunk was like her in high school, Luna worries her ambition to be a rocker is unrealistic.

When food Lincoln has saved in the fridge gets taken, a territory war in the fridge ensues.
A messy mom and son compete against a dad and son team who aren’t afraid of a little water! As they take on a bunch of edible challenges, only one wins enough points to move onto the bonus round.

schedule.episodeTitle: EJ Grand Slammers vs. Santa Barbara Goldies
schedule.description: Two teams of best friends compete in a series of balancing, throwing, and catching challenges. While one team struggles to learn that slow and steady wins the race, the other team’s aim earns them a shot at the final round!
